website_summaries.verdict: A great choice for those who need support, but want some fun colors, too.
pros: Black, Candy Pink, Navy, and Tropical Teal
Flexible synthetic upper, cushioned footbed, durable synthetic outsole
cons: Some report they shrink if left in the sun

customer_reviews.title: Most comfortable ever.
customer_reviews.text: I have foot problems. I hate the ordinary ugly crocs. I had a pair of nice Croc looking sandals with fine cushioned footbeds a few years ago. I wore them to death. These have the same wonderful footbeds. I wear them almost every day.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L

customer_reviews.title: Great product Can even take on water
customer_reviews.text: Love these babies. Very comfortable design and looks great. Im on the beach fishing alot in the summer months so they come in handy because I can rinse all the sand off my feet before entering the car..
customer_reviews.author: tameka111

customer_reviews.title: Buy 1-2 sizes LOWER than your normal shoe size
customer_reviews.text: Comfy but get at least one size smaller if you're female. I usually wear a 9 but that was way too big for these Crocs. I bought a sz 8 and I think I might exchange them for sz 7 since they still feel slightly lose, and these types of sandals tend to stretch over time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Haven’t came across a pair of Crocs that weren’t. Just a little too narrow but not enough to where I won’t use them.
customer_reviews.author: Sang_7

customer_reviews.title: ok

customer_reviews.title: I love these Crocs!
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar pair, which after 10 years I had worn a hole in the sole. I bought these to replace them. I like these even better as they do not have the traditional Crock holes punched into the rubber. Love!

product_meta.title: Crocs Men's and Women's Classic Slide Sandal
product_meta.description: Original. Comfortable. Versatile. For those who like to keep it simple, bright and functionally fun, we’ve carried over everything you love about our Classic Clogs and put it in a sporty, relaxing new slide. Our original Croslite foam cushion will keep you comfortably supported from pool to beach to backyard gatherings and beyond. Choose your color and slide into a new favorite! Great for pool, beach, and beyond!
